About Me

Few things about me...

Bio

Born and raised in Ethiopia. Tsedey has an overall +10 years’ of experience in Project Management, Human Resource Management and Website/Mobile Development. Tsedey has worked in an International Airport, Academic institution, Service Industry, NGO, Web agency and as a Freelancer. Recently, Tsedey has been focusing on frontend development with HTML5, SASS, javaScript (jQuery and Vue). Tsedey has a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer.
